title: He used to not pray, how can he know if Allah forgave him? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Maran from Egypt uh so uh I recently yeah I I used to do a lot of s I'm actually 15 and I and I used to not pray but now I started so like how do I know that Allah has forgiven me and stuff like that you can't you can't know whether Allah Asel has forgiven your past sins or not but you have to be hopeful you must think positive Le of Allah asael and you must do your level best to do good deeds and get closer to Allah while having this remorse and the feeling of guilt over the past sins and inshallah this is a good sign that Allah will forgive your sins
